
######################################
# AUTOGENERATED on 2025-12-18 01:15:03.982353                #
######################################


#leader_trait_buccaneer_3 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            
        }
        has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_buccaneer_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_buccaneer_3
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_buccaneer }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_buccaneer_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_buccaneer_3
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_defence_engineer #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_defence_engineer
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_defence_engineer_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_defence_engineer
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_fleet_organizer }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_fleet_organizer_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_common = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_politician
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_politician
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_politician }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {

        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {

                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes

            ruler = {

            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_common = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_common = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            
        }
        has_grand_archive_dlc = yes
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_common = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_common = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc

            remove_trait = leader_trait_treasure_hoarder_3

        hidden_effect = {

            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_common = yes

#leader_trait_armada_logistician_2 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_armada_logistician_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_armada_logistician_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_armada_logistician_2
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_armada_logistician }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_armada_logistician_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_armada_logistician_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_border_guard_2 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_border_guard_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_border_guard_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_border_guard_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_border_guard_2
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_border_guard }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_border_guard_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_border_guard_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_border_guard_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_crew_trainer_2 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_crew_trainer_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_crew_trainer_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_crew_trainer_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_crew_trainer_2
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_crew_trainer }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_crew_trainer_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_crew_trainer_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_crew_trainer_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_gale_speed_2 } }
    }
    allow = {

        }

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_gale_speed_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_gale_speed_2
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_gale_speed }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_gale_speed_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_gale_speed_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_gale_speed_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_guardian_2 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_guardian_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_guardian_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_guardian_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_guardian_2
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_guardian }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_guardian_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_guardian_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_guardian_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_home_guard_2 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_home_guard_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_home_guard_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_home_guard_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_home_guard_2
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_home_guard }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_home_guard_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_home_guard_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_home_guard_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_intimidator_2 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_intimidator_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_intimidator_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_veteran = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_veteran = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_veteran_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_intimidator_2
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_intimidator_2
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_veteran = yes
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_intimidator }
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_intimidator_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_intimidator_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_intimidator_2
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_veteran = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_veteran = yes
            }
        }
    }
}


#leader_trait_armorer #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_armorer_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = commander ID = subclass_commander_councilor }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_armorer
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_armorer
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_armorer_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_armorer }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_armorer
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes

            }
            root = {

            }

        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_bellicose } }

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }

            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_bellicose }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_bellicose

            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes

            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes

            }
            root = {

            }
        }
    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper } }
    }
    allow = {
        root = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_check_trait_resources_cost_paragon = yes
            
        }
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_points_cost_paragon = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_check_trait_picks = yes
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_paragon_trigger = yes
        }
        
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_commander_leader_trait_peacekeeper
    }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = add_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_change_class_add_trait = {
                CLASS = commander ID = leader_trait_peacekeeper
            }            
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_deduct_trait_points_paragon = yes
                
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_deduct_trait_costs_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_commander_leader_trait_peacekeeper_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = remove_xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_costs_desc_alt_2
        ruler = {
            remove_trait = leader_trait_peacekeeper
        }
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_ruler_refund_trait_points_picks_paragon = yes
            }
            root = {
                xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_country_refund_trait_cost_paragon = yes
            }
        }
    }
}
